fortunes.fortune: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Good things come to those who wait, but better things come to those who work for it.
Your kindness will be repaid in unexpected ways.
The best is yet to come.
Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
A smile is the universal language of kindness.
Believe in yourself, and you will be unstoppable.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
You will find happiness in the most unexpected places.
Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
The harder you work, the luckier you get.
Your future is as bright as your faith.
Do not wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Fortune favors the bold.
A problem shared is a problem halved.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
You are stronger than you think.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
